definitions: a person who sends or directs someone to an expert or specialist for consideration

examples.text: because the referrer knows the pulmonologist, he can give the patient more insight into what the doctor is like

shortDefinitions: person who sends someone to expert for consideration

definitions: the last web address accessed by a browser prior to loading a particular web page, used to identify sources of traffic

examples.text: most of the referrers for my website are search engines
they have been working on changes to make it easier for users to control referrer data

shortDefinitions: last web address accessed by browser prior to loading particular web page
